q: . Canalys analyst Pete Cunningham called the pact "a huge win for Microsoft." Indeed, the company is clearly hoping the tie-up with Nokia will change its sagging fortunes in the phone market. I am excited about this partnership with Nokia, said Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer , at a news conference in London. "Ecosystems thrive when fueled by speed, innovation, and scale. Mr Sergey Brin will devote his time to "strategic projects", particularly developing new products. The word is that the American executives behind the launch of Simon Cowell 's X Factor US are not convinced that Cheryl Cole is well enough known among the show's potential core audience. It was thought the American job was a done deal but it seems the US executives have had a last-minute change of heart. They are now questioning whether she's famous enough in America. Seeing Gabrielle Giffords ' left eye flickering, her husband, Mark Kelly, started saying: Gabrielle Giffords , open your eyes, open your eyes, Kirsten Gillibrand said. After about 30 seconds, Gabrielle Giffords did just that. "You could tell she was desperately trying to focus, and it took enormous strength from her," Kirsten Gillibrand said.

,... Barack Obama to run for president in 2012 Washington, January 21: US Barack Obama has planned to run for a second term in office for the 2012 presidential election despite his low popularity. Another 21/2 years passed before President Bush , facing the Republicans' loss of Congress, decided to let Donald Rumsfeld go. long EU probe: report LONDON( Reuters)- Google Inc. wants to avoid a lengthy legal battle with European Union regulators investigating its market dominance, the Sunday Telegraph quoted its chief executive as saying. We certainly want to avoid that, Eric Schmidt told the paper in an interview.
